COURSEWORK  
Analysis, CAD, CFD, Design, Engineering  concepts , FEA, HVAC, Production , Solid Mechanics, Structural materials,  Thermal . 
TECHNICAL SKILLS  
Microsoft Softwares             :     Excel, Word , Project

Analysis  Softwares               :     Abaqus  FEA  and ANSYS  
Machining Tools                  :     CNCs , mills, lathes, grinders , arc welding  
 
PROJECTS  
Develop ed new method o f Airfoil Meshing .                                                                                                      Jul 2021 – Jan 2022  
• Created  unstructured airfoil mesh using ANSYS Fluent  and performed 8 trails  on ICEM CFD  in 3 months . 
• Generated  NACA - 12 airfoil , using Spalart -Allmaras  turbulence model achieved results were 90% identical to NASA 
graph of NACA airfoil.  
 
Design of Single -speed reduction gearbox .                                                                                                      Sep 2021 – Jan 2022  
• Designed two stage gear box using SolidWorks , gaining 95% performance and success rate.  
• Developed 2D sketches, Bill of material s, motion study, exploded view , and Bending moment of each shaft with gears.  
 
Static Analysis on  overhead line equipment .                                                                                                    Sep 2021 – Jan 2022  
• Designed FEA model using ABAQUS , attained simulation  results were 97% accurate when compared to the theoretical 
results.  
• Performed Reaction force  and Stress analysis  on 8 models to achieve feasible interference fit to withstand given axial 
load using scientific principles of non -linear material behavior.  
 
Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) of car and caravan .                                                                          Jan 2021 – Apr 2022  
• Overhauled  the model of car and caravan  in ANSYS fluent  and implemented CFD tool  to investigate the complex 
flow fields around the model  to optimize the performance.  
• Obtained a 10% reduction in Drag force  which resulted in  better Fuel efficiency  by the modif ied design.  
 
Design and fabrication of fitness equipment for power generation .                                                              Jan 2020 – Mar 2020  
• Generated the Project idea  and p roposed design improvements t o improve designing solutions . 
• Expertly created complex mechanical components using Solid Works , enhancing system performance by 20%. 
• Prototyped, integrated, assembled and tested  to ensure its quality and integrity.
